items.name: Acquisition delay
items.hint: Time between preparation/extraction and measurement. A value of 1.5 means 90 seconds

items.name: Average brightness
items.hint: The average brightness of the full sensor image can be used to identify brightness-related artifacts

items.name: Chip specification
items.hint: Detailed information about the chip used

items.name: Chip measurement
items.hint: If multiple measurements are done on the same chip, this is the nth measurement

items.name: Exact channel width
items.hint: The exact channel width with submicron resolution might vary from batch to batch

items.name: Tubing
items.hint: Describe the type of tubing used

items.name: Details
items.hint: Any additional information relevant for the experiment
